overview.en: DDXP is a pass-through upgrade for the existing public welfare development dilemma. It fully utilizes the unique advantages of deblocking, traceability, and non-tamperability of the blockchain, adopts the poc consensus mechanism, and introduces distributed storage, Internet of Things, and big data. A new generation of public welfare blockchain applications such as emerging technologies.
overview.zh: DDXP是针对现有公益发展困境的一次通证化升级，充分运用区块链的去中心化、可追溯、不可篡改等独特优势，采用poc共识机制，并引入分布式存储，物联网、大数据等新兴技术的新一代公益性的区块链应用。
